name: jiopay-crawler
description: AWS Lambda Puppeteer SPA FAQ crawler-scraper with S3 outputs

scripts.push: aws ecr get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin YOUR_AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com && docker tag jiopay-crawler:latest YOUR_AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/jiopay-crawler:latest && docker push YOUR_AWS_ACCOUNT_ID.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/jiopay-crawler:latest
